entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
